title: Backend API: Categories and Expenses CRUD + Health
description: Implement REST endpoints for health check, category CRUD, and expense CRUD including validation, sorting, filtering, and error handling contracts.
acceptance_criteria: Category endpoints support create/list/update/delete with validation and conflict handling.
Expense endpoints support create/list/update/delete with validation and category reference checks.
GET /api/expenses supports from/to/category_id filters and correct sort order.
Error responses follow {"error":{"code":string,"message":string}} with appropriate HTTP status codes.
